T02D1917:23b-10: rgyal ba kun gyi gnas rnams dang //
T02D1917:23b-11: rgyal ba thams cad bslu bar bya //
T02D1917:23b-13: rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag pa'o //
T02D1917:23b-14: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1917:23b-15: da ni phra men ma dang 'chol ba'i rgyud la zhugs pa rnams rnam par sbyong ba'i phyir /
T02D1917:23b-16: bshad gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1917:23b-17: bshad gci'i zas nyid kyi bya ba byed pa des
T02D1917:23b-18: mngon par dga' ba'i don gyi dngos grub bskyed pa
T02D1917:23b-19: ga la yod pa de rnams kyi don du 'di
T02D1917:23b-21: de yang de dag ni zas ma yin pa sngags
T02D1917:23b-22: kyis mngon par bsngags nas zos na grub par smra
T02D1917:23b-23: ba la / de rnams la 'di las gsungs pa'i
T02D1917:23b-24: sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
T02D1917:23b-25: gsung thugs rdo rjer bsgoms nas bshang gci mngon par
T02D1917:23b-26: ba la / bsngags te / rab tu 'bar ba
T02D1917:23b-27: na bza' bar bya'o zhes nges par sbyor ba la
T02D1917:23b-29: de rab tu 'bar nas blangs pas sku dang gsung
T02D1917:23b-30: dang thugs mngon par rtogs pa la 'jug par 'gyur
T02D1917:23b-31: ro // khyab 'jug gi rgyud la mngon par dga' ba rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1917:23b-32: ma dang sring mo bu mo la //
T02D1917:23b-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1917:23b-34: de dag gi yang spong ba la mngon par mi
T02D1917:23b-35: phyogs pa rnams la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs
T02D1917:23b-36: pa sngon du song ba'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom
T02D1917:23b-37: zhing sngags zlos par gnang bas byang chub chen po'i
T02D1917:23b-38: bag chags skyed pa la 'jug pas rgyud nyid du
T02D1917:23b-39: 'gyur bas phyis 'di la 'jug pa'i rgyur gzhag pa
T02D1917:23b-40: yin te ma ni spyan ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1917:23b-41: sring mo ni rdo rje snyems ma la sogs pa ste /
T02D1917:23b-42: 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i'o //
T02D1917:23b-43: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po la ni de nyid bu mo ste /
T02D1917:23b-44: de rnams dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D1917:23b-45: pa'i ngo bo nyid du bsgoms pas yang dag par
T02D1917:24a-3: 'dod pa bas ni mnyes byas na /
T02D1917:24a-4: theg chen mchog gi chos nyid kyis //
T02D1917:24a-5: dngos grub rgya chen des thob bo //
T02D1917:24a-6: zhes 'jug par bya ba'i phyir bstan te /
T02D1917:24a-8: sangs rgyas gtso bo yum dag la //
T02D1917:24a-9: rnam par mi rtog blo can gyis //
T02D1917:24a-10: mnyes par byas kyang mi chags te //
T02D1917:24a-13: sgyu ma lta bur bsgom pa'i phyir //
T02D1917:24a-14: mnyes par byas su zin kyang sngar gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par mi rtog par 'gyur ro //
T02D1917:24a-15: de nas ni rnal 'byor pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir //
T02D1917:24a-16: rnam par mi rtog blo can gyis //
T02D1917:24a-19: ngo mtshar du gyur zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags
T02D1917:24a-20: la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyis yang dag par
T02D1917:24a-21: sbyor ba bsgoms pas kyang 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro
T02D1917:24a-22: zhes bas so // rmad du gyur pa'i zhes bya
T02D1917:24a-23: ba ni gzhan dag las sngon ma byung ba'i phyir
T02D1917:24a-24: zhes bas so // ro // ci'i slad du zhes pa'i sgra ni rab tu smad pa ste /
T02D1917:24a-25: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi
T02D1917:24a-26: nang du 'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa gsungs zhes
T02D1917:24a-27: bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtso bo'i
T02D1917:24a-28: yul la 'dod pa spyod pas grub par 'gyur ro
T02D1917:24a-29: zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di gsungs pa la de ni
T02D1917:24a-30: ma gsung shig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1917:24a-31: de la byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ni
T02D1917:24a-32: bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba thams cad mkhyen
T02D1917:24a-33: pas yongs su smad par 'gyur ba de ni mi
T02D1917:24a-34: srid na / ci'i phyir de rnams 'di skad gsungs /
T02D1917:24a-35: de ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang dge ba'i rtsa
T02D1917:24a-36: ba yongs su ma smin pa rnams yongs su smod
T02D1917:24a-37: pa'i sems skye 'ang zhu bar mi nus pa rnams
T02D1917:24a-38: kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas 'di skad gsungs pa yin
T02D1917:24a-39: no // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang
T02D1917:24a-40: chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka'
T02D1917:24a-41: no // stsal to // rigs kyi bu rnams thong
T02D1917:24a-42: de skad ma zer cig ces bya ba la thong
T02D1917:24a-43: zhes pa'i sgra ni mi rigs pa'i don to //
T02D1917:24a-44: de skad ma zer cig ces bya ba 'dis ni dgag pa 'grub ste /
T02D1917:24a-45: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
T02D1917:24a-46: pos spyan la sogs pa dang sbyor ba bsgoms pas
T02D1917:24a-47: 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni
T02D1917:24a-49: ci'i phyir 'di rigs pa yin zhe na //
T02D1917:24b-0: ye shes snying po can rnams @24b kyi ;
T02D1917:24b-1: / sangs rgyas kun gyi chos nyid 'di //
T02D1917:24b-3: gang spyan ma la sogs pa dang yang dag par
T02D1917:24b-4: sbyor bas nye bar mtshon pa'i shes rab kyi pha
T02D1917:24b-5: rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni chos nyid kyi
T02D1917:24b-6: rgyus 'tshang rgya ba'i rgyu yin te /
T02D1917:24b-7: gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig
T02D1917:24b-8: pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i snying po'i ye shes
T02D1917:24b-9: can no // 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gzhag pa gsungs pa'o //
T02D1917:24b-10: ci'i phyir de sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid yin zhe na /
T02D1917:24b-11: snying po chos kyi don las byung //
T02D1917:24b-12: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1917:24b-13: snying po yang yin la chos kyang yin pas na
T02D1917:24b-14: snying po chos te chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang
T02D1917:24b-16: de nyid ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi don yin pas na chos kyi don to //
T02D1917:24b-17: de las byung ba ni skye ba ste /
T02D1917:24b-18: gang 'di spyan la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i tshul
T02D1917:24b-19: gyis 'tshang rgya ba ni chos skyi dbyings ston pa
T02D1917:24b-20: yin no // de nas de rnam par bsgom pa
T02D1917:24b-21: ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma la sogs pa ltar
T02D1917:24b-22: dngos por 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa spangs
T02D1917:24b-23: pa las 'tshang rgya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1917:24b-25: byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin //
T02D1917:24b-27: bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi spyod pa ste /
T02D1917:24b-28: de nyid rten du gyur pas na gnas zhes bya'o //
T02D1917:24b-29: byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs pa ni bstan pa
T02D1917:24b-30: 'dis chos dang gang zag gi ngo bo med par
T02D1917:24b-31: thos pas des skrag cing brgyal bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1917:24b-33: sa chen po la zhugs pa rnams skrag par 'gyur /
T02D1917:24b-34: skrag pa'i sems ni chos dang gang zag tu 'dzin
T02D1917:24b-35: par gyur pa rnams la 'byung bas nas chen po
T02D1917:24b-36: la zhugs pa rnams la mi srid kyi zhe na
T02D1917:24b-37: / 'dir so so'i skye bo nyid la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pas nyes pa med do //
T02D1917:24b-38: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T02D1917:24b-39: po 'di dag bslang bar gsol zhes bya ba ni
T02D1917:24b-40: ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus chos bdag med pa 'di
T02D1917:24b-41: rtogs pa bskyed pas 'jigs pa bsal te bslang bar
T02D1917:24b-42: gsol ba'o // de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1917:24b-43: cad kyis gsol ba gsan nas bslang bar bya ba'i
T02D1917:24b-44: phyir nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1917:24b-45: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
T02D1917:24b-46: par zhugs so zhes pa ste /
T02D1917:25a-0: nam mkha' ltar mnyam pas nam @25a * //
T02D1917:25a-2: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T02D1917:25a-3: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ni gnyis su med pa ste /
T02D1917:25a-4: de la dmigs pas na ming de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1917:25a-5: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyis su med pa rdo
T02D1917:25a-6: rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms
T02D1917:25a-7: par zhugs pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang
T02D1917:25a-8: chen po'o // de nas rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1917:25a-9: de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyis reg pas bdag med par rtogs te /
T02D1917:25a-10: bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bral bas ni de thams cad 'jigs shing skrag pa dang bral bas so //
T02D1917:25a-11: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D1917:25a-12: ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus 'gro ba'i don mthong bas
T02D1917:25a-14: ae ma'i chos zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1917:25a-15: kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu la shin tu yang
T02D1917:25a-16: ngo mtshar skyes nas smras pa'o //
T02D1917:25a-17: ae ma'o chos kyi don byung ba //
T02D1917:25a-18: zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi
T02D1917:25a-19: mthus ngo mtshar gyi rang bzhin gyi don du gdul
T02D1917:25a-20: bya rnams kyi rgyud la byang chub kyi sems mngon
T02D1917:25a-21: du byas pa'i ngo bo ste de byung ba ni
T02D1917:25a-22: skyes pa'o // chos don dag pa zhes pa la phung po la sogs pa ni chos so //
T02D1917:25a-23: dag pa'i don ni ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1917:25a-24: de nyid bdag med pa ste ;
T02D1917:25a-25: bdag med pa'i rdo rje de nyid kyis rigs thams
T02D1917:25a-26: cad kyi rigs thams cad kyi rgyal por gyur cing
T02D1917:25a-27: bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pas na rdo rje
T02D1917:25a-29: 'dis ni mi bskyod pa'i ngo bor gsungs pa'o //
T02D1917:25a-30: sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag / ces bya
T02D1917:25a-31: ba ni sku gsung thugs rnam par dag pa gang
T02D1917:25a-32: yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1917:25a-33: nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa nyid //
T02D1917:25a-34: ces bya ba ni de bzhin nyid dang /
T02D1917:25a-35: de nyid gnas su gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1917:25a-36: rnam par rtog pa thams cad med pas na rnam par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1917:25a-37: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi yin pa'i phyir snang ba med pa'o //
T02D1917:25a-39: ces bya ba ni sku rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du gsungs pa'o //
T02D1917:25a-40: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ni dus gsum po de nyid lam ste /
T02D1917:25a-41: de la 'jug pa'i ngang tshul gang yin pa de ni /
T02D1917:25a-42: dus gsum dag gis lam du 'byung //
T02D1917:25a-43: zhes bya ste de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D1917:25b-0: de'i thugs ni rdo rje @25b 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1917:25b-1: dbyings gyur pa zhes pa'ang de nyid kyi rigs thams cad byang chub kyi sems nyid la skye ste /
T02D1917:25b-2: de ni chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1917:25b-3: nam mkha' ltar thams cad du song bas na nam mkha' chen po'o //
T02D1917:25b-4: nam mkha' ltar dus gsum med pa'i ngo bor gyur
T02D1917:25b-5: pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i lam ste
T02D1917:25b-6: / 'dis ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid du gsungs pa'o //
T02D1917:25b-7: nam mkha'i sku zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1917:25b-8: nam mkha' las kyang byung ba ni skyes pa ste /
T02D1917:25b-9: 'dis ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs kyi ngo bor gsungs pa'o //
T02D1917:25b-10: nam mkha'i gsung gi lam ston pa //
T02D1917:25b-11: zhes bya ba ni tshig dang tshig ma yin pa'i sgra thams cad ni brag ca lta bu ste /
T02D1917:25b-12: 'dis ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi ngo bor gsungs pa'o //
T02D1917:25b-13: nam mkha'i thugs ni chos kyi chog / ces bya
T02D1917:25b-14: ba ni sems nam mkha' ltar rang bzhin gyis 'od
T02D1917:25b-15: gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i ngo bor gyur pa
T02D1917:25b-16: gang yin pa ded ni nam mkha'i thugs te /
T02D1917:25b-17: de nyid chos kyi mchog ste dam pa de la
T02D1917:25b-18: spyod cing gnas pa gan yin pa de la de
T02D1917:25b-19: skad ces bya'o // 'dis ni dam tshig gi rigs kyi ngo bor gsungs pa'o //
T02D1917:25b-20: kun du spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten
T02D1917:25b-21: pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams
T02D1917:25b-22: cad rdzogs par byed pa'i spyod pa ni kun du
T02D1917:25b-23: spyod pa'o // de nyid phul du byung ba'i mchog
T02D1917:25b-24: ste de gang du gsungs pa de ni spyod pa
T02D1917:25b-25: thams cad kyi mchog gi le'u zhes bya'o //
T02D1917:25b-28: // / bsgom pa'am bzlas pa byed par 'dod pas sku
T02D1917:25b-29: dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang rjes
T02D1917:25b-30: su mnyes pa'i mchod pa bya dgos pa'i phyir /
T02D1917:25b-31: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa sku dang
T02D1917:25b-32: gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i le'u gsungs pa'o
T02D1917:25b-33: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ku dang
T02D1917:25b-34: gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba la sku zhes bya
T02D1917:25b-35: ba la sku rdo rje'i ngo bo ni sku'i gsang
T02D1917:25b-36: // ba'o // gsung rdo rje'i ngo bo ni gsung gi gsang ba'o //
T02D1917:25b-37: thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo ni thugs kyi gsang ba ste /
T02D1917:25b-38: gang sku mdog dang dbyibs dang phyag mtshan dang phyag
T02D1917:25b-39: rgya la sogs pa rnam pa rgya che ba rnam
T02D1917:25b-40: pa sna tshogs pa dpag tu med pa gang yin
T02D1917:26a-1: sku'i gsang bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1917:26a-2: thugs ka'i zla ba la rdo rje bsgom pa ni thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
T02D1917:26a-3: lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po rnam
T02D1917:26a-4: par bsam zhing sngags kyi yi ge brjod la de'i
T02D1917:26a-5: don la lhag par mos pa ni gsung gi gsang
T02D1917:26a-6: ba'o zhes / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1917:26a-7: pos gsungs pas de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1917:26a-8: de la ming de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1917:26a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1917:26a-10: dang thugs gsang ba zhes bya ba de la snyoms
T02D1917:26a-11: par zhugs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
T02D1917:26a-12: rnam par rgyal ba'i gnas rdo rje //
T02D1917:26a-13: zhes bya ba ni sku la sku'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1917:26a-14: dang bral bar rtogs pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D1917:26a-15: gnas te / de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
T02D1917:26a-16: rnam par rgyal ba'i gnas rdo rje //
T02D1917:26a-18: mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis pa rdo rje zhes bya
T02D1917:26a-19: ba la chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis dag
T02D1917:26a-20: pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam pa nyid de
T02D1917:26a-21: / de nyid ni mi gnyis pa ste ;
T02D1917:26a-22: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis pa rdo rje zhes bya'o //
T02D1917:26a-23: rdo rje gsum po zhes bya ba ni ji skad
T02D1917:26a-24: du gsungs pa'i sku la sogs pa ste bsgrub par
T02D1917:26a-27: gnas kyi rnam par bsgom zhes pa ni sku la sogs pa bsgom pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1917:26a-28: sngags kyi mtshan gyis shin du mtshan byas la //
T02D1917:26a-29: zhes pa ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1917:26a-30: 'di yis zhes bya ba ni smras ma thag pa'i sngags gsum pos so //
T02D1917:26a-31: bsgrub pa nyid du bya zhes pa ni brtan par bya'o //
T02D1917:26a-32: sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sna'i rtse
T02D1917:26a-33: mor yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gyi rin po che
T02D1917:26a-34: bsgoms pas ye shes kyi snang ba bskyed pa ni
T02D1917:26a-35: sgron ma ste de la dmigs pas na sgron ma
T02D1917:26a-36: rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T02D1917:26a-37: rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za ba ni don yod pa ste /
T02D1917:26a-41: ro la sogs pa rang rang gi rnam par thar pa skyed pa ste /
T02D1917:26a-42: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1917:26a-43: rtag par 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas //
T02D1917:26a-44: sangs rgyas tshul bzhin mchod par bya /
T02D1917:26a-45: zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang
T02D1917:26a-46: ro dang reg bya rnams sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs
T02D1917:26a-47: pas sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsgoms
T02D1917:26a-48: te de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
T02D1917:26b-1: de bzhin du yid kyis bdud rtsi lnga rnams kyang
T02D1917:26b-2: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsgoms la
T02D1917:26b-3: mchod de / sngags la dmigs pa'i lus kyis bsgrub par bya //
T02D1917:26b-5: lus la lus med par bsgom pa ni sngags la dmigs pa ste /
T02D1917:26b-6: de'i lus ni sngags la dmigs pa'i lus so //
T02D1917:26b-7: des ngag ste sngags zlos pa la sbyor ba dang /
T02D1917:26b-8: yid kyis blo la bzhag cing rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1917:26b-9: bskul nas bsgrub par bya zhes bya ba ni sngags
T02D1917:26b-10: pas mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rdzogs par bya'o
T02D1917:26b-11: // sems la dmigs pa bdag med par bsgrub par bya zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02D1917:26b-12: sems la sems med par bsgom pa ni sems dang dmigs pa ste /
T02D1917:26b-14: ngag dang lus kyang rnam par bsgom //
T02D1917:26b-15: zhes bya ba ni ngag la ngag med par bsgom
T02D1917:26b-16: pa dang lus la lus med par bsgom par bsgrub
T02D1917:26b-17: par bya'o // ci zhig bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02D1917:26b-18: sbyor ba rnam gsum zhes bya ste /
T02D1917:26b-19: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1917:26b-20: gang la gnas nas she na /
T02D1917:26b-21: nam mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa'i gnas //
T02D1917:26b-23: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ni de bzhin nyid do //
T02D1917:26b-24: de nyid ni sbyor ba gsum po gang yin pa de ni gnas yin pas na ;
T02D1917:26b-25: nam mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa'i gnas //
T02D1917:26b-27: de de lta bur bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1917:26b-28: smras ma thag pa'i don de nyid rnam par dbye ba ni /
T02D1917:26b-29: lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs na //
T02D1917:26b-30: ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med //
T02D1917:26b-32: lus dang ngag dang yid la dngos po med pa'i
T02D1917:26b-33: ngo bo nyid du rnam par dpyad pa ni dngos
T02D1917:26b-34: po ste / des dmigs na de rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med do //
T02D1917:26b-35: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni sngags kyi lus te /
T02D1917:26b-36: de dag gi sngags kyi lus su sbyor ba zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1917:26b-37: lus la sogs par ji skad gsungs par bsgom pa'o //
T02D1917:26b-38: tshul 'di lta bur sbyor ba 'dis ni byang chub med cing bsgom pa'ang med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1917:26b-39: dmigs su med pas na byang chub pa med cing bsgom pas kyang nye bar dmigs su med do //
T02D1917:26b-41: byang chub med cing bsgom pa'ang med //
T02D1917:27a-0: de ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi @27a * //
T02D1917:27a-1: ngo bo nyid rnam par dpyad nas //
T02D1917:27a-2: byang chub sbyor ba bsgom par bya //
T02D1917:27a-4: spyan gyi tshul du sbyor ba dang //
T02D1917:27a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang bshad pa bsgom par bya ste //
T02D1917:27a-6: spyan lta bu la sogs par yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtshan ma tsam nye bar bzung ba ste ;
T02D1917:27a-7: de nye bar bzung la de'i dngos po'i ngo bo
T02D1917:27a-8: nyid rnam par brtags na rdul phra mo tsam gyi
T02D1917:27a-9: chos rnams kyang dmigs su med do //
T02D1917:27a-10: des na byang chub la sbyor ba //
T02D1917:27a-12: sngags kyis brtags pa zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi sgo nas so //
T02D1917:27a-13: byang chub la sbyor ba bsgom pa na rnam par
T02D1917:27a-14: rtog pa la spyod pa rnams kyis sngon gyi dus
T02D1917:27a-15: su bya ba gsungs pa ni //
T02D1917:27a-16: sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam //
T02D1917:27a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1917:27a-18: spro ba dang bsdu ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02D1917:27a-19: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni 'dir rnam par snang mdzad la bya ste /
T02D1917:27a-20: yi ge h'um las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la
T02D1917:27a-21: de'i steng du de nyid las dpal rdo rje sems
T02D1917:27a-22: dpa' bskyed la de'i thugs ka'i zla bar h'um las
T02D1917:27a-23: rdo rje rtse dgu pa rdo rje'i dbus su yi
T02D1917:27a-24: ge h'um bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1917:27a-25: sangs rgyas ni 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa'o zhes gsungs
T02D1917:27a-26: pas 'dir yang rdo rje 'chang chen po ni sangs
T02D1917:27a-27: rgyas so // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1917:27a-28: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1917:27a-29: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1917:27a-30: rdo rje padma ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D1917:27a-31: pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas nas
T02D1917:27a-32: de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zla ba dang padma
T02D1917:27a-33: la 'dug pa'i sngags pas spyan dang lhan cig tu
T02D1917:27a-34: yang dag par sbyor ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1917:27a-35: rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1917:27a-36: zhes bya ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1917:27a-37: dang por sbyor ba nan tan gyis //
T02D1917:27a-38: zhes bya ba ni sna'i rtse mo la rdo rje
T02D1917:27a-39: phra mo dang rin po che la sogs pa zla
T02D1917:27a-40: ba gsum du bsgoms pas sems brtan par byas pa
T02D1917:27a-42: de ltar dang po sbyor ba rnam par bsgoms nas
T02D1917:27a-43: rnal 'byor thams cad bsgom par bya'o zhes gnyis su
T02D1917:27a-44: med par mnyam pa rnam par rgyal ba las gsungs
T02D1917:27a-45: pas na de ni dang po'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1917:27b-0: nan tan gyis @27b zhes bya ba ni lhod pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis so //
T02D1917:27b-1: de yi steng du yongs su bsgom //
T02D1917:27b-2: zhes pa ni rin po che'i dkyil 'khor te de'i steng du rdo rje padma'i gdan /
T02D1917:27b-3: der yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1917:27b-4: der yang rin chen 'byung ldan gyi skur rnam par
T02D1917:27b-5: bas mas la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sbyor ba
T02D1917:27b-6: bsgom par bya'o // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1917:27b-7: de la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D1917:27b-8: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1917:27b-9: pa bzhi po spro zhing sprul nas shar la sogs
T02D1917:27b-10: pa'i phyogs kyi cha la dgod do //
T02D1917:27b-11: de la gnas nas ci zhig bya zhe na gsungs pa /

T02D1917:30b-40: m'a ma k'i dang sbyor ba las byung ba'i rang
T02D1917:30b-41: gi khu ba sngags pa'i dkyil 'khor lta bur bsgom
T02D1917:30b-42: pa 'di ni dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa bsgom
T02D1917:30b-43: pa'o // rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1917:30b-47: mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo ji lta bar gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /
T02D1917:31a-0: @31a * // rnam par shes pa'i phung po re re la de
T02D1917:31a-1: bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su gang bar gyur pa
T02D1917:31a-2: ci 'dra ba bdag kyang de 'dra bar gyur cig
T02D1917:31a-3: ces smon lam 'debs shing sgom pa ni sku rjes
T02D1917:31a-5: chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa
T02D1917:31a-6: so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1917:31a-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D1917:31a-8: ye shes ci 'dra ba bdag kyang de 'dra bar
T02D1917:31a-9: gyur cig ces smon cing sgom par byed pa ni
T02D1917:31a-10: chos 'dzin pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ba'o /
T02D1917:31a-11: rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ci 'dra ba bdag kyang
T02D1917:31a-12: de dang 'dra bar gyur cig ces rnam par sems
T02D1917:31a-13: shing sgom pa grub na ni rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1917:31a-15: da ni mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa //
T02D1917:31a-16: sems can kun gyi sems gang yin //
T02D1917:31a-18: gang 'di 'khor ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi'o //
T02D1917:31a-19: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis mtshan//
T02D1917:31a-20: zhes bya ba ni sems can de dag thams cad
T02D1917:31a-21: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T02D1917:31a-23: khyad par ci lta bu zhe na /
T02D1917:31a-24: spyod pa mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur //
T02D1917:31a-25: zhes pa ste de bzhin du ro gcig cing mnyam pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1917:31a-26: bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar nam mkha' dang mnyam
T02D1917:31a-27: pa'i spyod bar gyur cig ces rnam par bsam zhing
T02D1917:31a-28: bsgom pa las bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs na rdo
T02D1917:31a-29: rje 'chang chen po dang mnyam par 'grub par 'gyur
T02D1917:31a-30: ro // sngags kyi rdo rje'i sku gang yin //
T02D1917:31a-31: zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag med pa'i'o //
T02D1917:31a-32: gsung yang sku yis rnam bsgoms pas//
T02D1917:31a-33: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi don bsgom zhing bzlas pa'i tshig gis sku rjes su dran pa ni /
T02D1917:31a-34: gsung yang sku yis rnam bsgoms pas //
T02D1917:31a-36: khu ba phyung ste zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba bsgom pa'i dam tshig dang ldan pas phyung ba'o //
T02D1917:31a-37: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung
T02D1917:31a-38: dang thugs rdo rjer lhag par mos pas rab tu
T02D1917:31a-39: 'bar ba'o // 'bras bu 'dod pas zhes bya ba
T02D1917:31a-40: la 'bras bu 'dod pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D1917:31a-41: ngo bor 'gro ba rnams bya bar 'dod cing de'i
T02D1917:31a-42: sprul pas nam mkha' gang ba'i sems can gyi khams
T02D1917:31a-44: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bskyed la dpal
T02D1917:31b-0: rdo rje sems dpa'i @31b rang bzhin du bsam par
T02D1917:31b-1: bya'o // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod
T02D1917:31b-2: pa rnams zhi ba'i nyams kyi rang bzhin dang bral
T02D1917:31b-4: de ltar 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir yang dag par sbyor ba'i bsgom pa bstan nas /
T02D1917:31b-5: de ni nges par gzung ba'i zhi ba'i sems las
T02D1917:31b-6: brtsams te gsungs ba ni de la shes rab kyi
T02D1917:31b-7: pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran
T02D1917:31b-8: pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na zhes bya ba ste
T02D1917:31b-9: de la shes rab kyi ni chos thams cad rang
T02D1917:31b-10: bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar rtogs pa'i thos pa dang
T02D1917:31b-11: bsam pa'i mtshan nyid can yin la bsgoms pa'i 'bras
T02D1917:31b-12: bu rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni shes
T02D1917:31b-13: rab de'i phun sum tshogs pa pha rol tu phyin
T02D1917:31b-15: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D1917:31b-16: de nyid ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas dam tshig go //
T02D1917:31b-17: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba //
T02D1917:31b-18: zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa'i chos thams cad do //
T02D1917:31b-20: thams cad ma skyes zag pa med //
T02D1917:31b-21: ces bya ba gsungs pas so //
T02D1917:31b-22: tshul de nyid kyis ni don dam par byang chub
T02D1917:31b-23: med cing byang chub khong du chung ba'i mngon par
T02D1917:31b-25: khams kyang med cing zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste skyed par byed pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1917:31b-26: de nyid kyis na dngos po nyid du 'byung ba'ang med pa'o //
T02D1917:31b-27: thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02D1917:31b-28: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1917:31b-29: mtshan ma med cing zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'o //
T02D1917:31b-30: yang de nyid kyi khyad par ni mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1917:31b-31: aa la sogs pa'i yi ge dang bral ba'o //
T02D1917:31b-32: nam mkha' bzhin zhes bya ba ni dpe bstan pa'o //
T02D1917:31b-33: de ltar mi skye ba yin yang gnyis kyi ngo
T02D1917:31b-34: bo yang ma yin la gnyis su med pa'i ngo
T02D1917:31b-35: bo yang ma yin pas na /
T02D1917:31b-36: gnyis med gnyi su med min no //
T02D1917:31b-37: gzhan yang zhi zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1917:31b-38: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang 'dod chags dang zhe
T02D1917:31b-39: sdang la sogs pa skye ba thams cad zhi pas
T02D1917:31b-40: na zhi ba'o // zhi ba de nyid kyi dpe bstan pa'i phyir ;
T02D1917:31b-41: / shin tu dri med nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1917:31b-43: bud med sems ni rab brtan pa //
T02D1917:31b-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
T02D1917:32a-0: nges par bzung ba ste yul yongs su mi spong ba dag rab tu @32a * //
T02D1917:32a-1: chags par bya ba'i phyir yin gyi de nyid kyi
T02D1917:32a-2: gnas skabs na de 'byung ba yod pa ni ma
T02D1917:32a-3: yin no // de bas na don gyis nges pa kho nar bshad pa yin no //
T02D1917:32a-4: de bzhin du 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang bshad par bya'o //
T02D1917:32a-5: rigs kyi sbyor bas rab bsgoms te //
T02D1917:32a-6: zhes pa ni zhe sdang gi rigs la m'a ma k'i'o //
T02D1917:32a-7: gti mug gi rigs la spyan ma la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis so //
T02D1917:32a-8: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang grub pa thob bo zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02D1917:32a-9: snga ma ni sku rdo rje la sogs ba'i dbye ba bstan pa'o //
T02D1917:32a-10: 'di ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid de 'dir khyad par ni de yod do //
T02D1917:32a-11: gang gzhan phra mor bshad pa rnams //
T02D1917:32a-12: zhes bya ba ni rigs ngan dang sme sha can
T02D1917:32a-13: la sogs pa rnams kyang sbyor ba 'dis 'grub par
T02D1917:32a-14: 'gyur ro // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1917:32a-15: zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs mi dmigs par bsgoms pas so //
T02D1917:32a-16: de zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1917:32a-17: sngags kyi spyod pa ni ji skad du bshad pa
T02D1917:32a-18: bzhin du mi dmigs pa la sogs par bsgom pa'o
T02D1917:32a-19: // de nyid phul du byung bas na mchog ste /
T02D1917:32a-20: de ston pa'i sgra'i tshogs la ni le'u zhes bya'o //
T02D1917:32a-21: sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog ces bya ba le'u bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1917:32a-23: // / tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1917:32a-24: rin po che bdun la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang
T02D1917:32a-25: yid dang de kho na'i mchod pa ni sems brtan
T02D1917:32a-26: par byas pa nyid dang sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D1917:32a-27: bsgrub bar bya'o zhes rab tu bstan par bya ba'i
T02D1917:32a-28: phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad gci'i dam tshig gi le'u gsungs so //
T02D1917:32a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal //
T02D1917:32a-30: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye
T02D1917:32a-31: shes bsgoms pas rin po che'i mchod pa thams cad
T02D1917:32a-33: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog smos pa yin no //
T02D1917:32a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che //
T02D1917:32a-35: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1917:32a-36: byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ngo bo bas na theg pa chen po'o //
T02D1917:32a-37: nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsgoms pas na nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D1917:32b-0: des sems can gyi khams thams cad mnyam pa sbyor bar byed pas @32b na rnam par sbyong ba'o //
T02D1917:32b-1: kun nas bzang bas na kun du bzang po ste /
T02D1917:32b-2: lha chen po gsum la sogs par sprul pas sems
T02D1917:32b-3: can rnams kyi don mdzad par gyur kyang 'dod chags
T02D1917:32b-4: la sogs pa rnams kyis mi gos pas na kun
T02D1917:32b-5: du bzang po'o // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che //
T02D1917:32b-6: zhes bya ba ni rigs te thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1917:32b-7: rdo rje theg par ston pa //
T02D1917:32b-8: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje theg pa rab tu
T02D1917:32b-9: ston par mdzad pas na 'di skad ces gsungs pa'o
T02D1917:32b-10: // nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa ni mnyam pa med ba dang tshad med pa gnyis kyis so //
T02D1917:32b-11: de nyid kyis na mchog go //
T02D1917:32b-12: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i ye shes ni thar ba'o //
T02D1917:32b-13: de thob par byed pa'i shes rab ni thar ba'i lam ste /
T02D1917:32b-14: de rnams ston pas ni rab ston pa'o //
T02D1917:32b-15: byang chub rnam pa gsum ni theg pa gsum mo //
T02D1917:32b-16: de'i bkod pa ni lam ste /
T02D1917:32b-17: de la gnas pa ni sems can gyi rgyud la ston cing gnas pa'o ;
T02D1917:32b-18: / sangs rgyas rnams kyi skal pa'i mchog ni sangs rgyas skal mchog ste /
T02D1917:32b-19: phul du byung ba'i dngos por grub pa'o //
T02D1917:32b-20: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnam par dag pas na dag pa'i bdag go //
T02D1917:32b-21: rang gi sems ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ni byang chub bo //
T02D1917:32b-22: de'i ngo bo nyid kyi sems ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1917:32b-23: spyan lnga rnam par rgyas shing yang sa pa gang la mnga' bde ni rgyas pa'i spyan no //
T02D1917:32b-24: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ni chos te /
T02D1917:32b-25: de'i dkyil 'khor gdul bya'i rgyud la spel bar mdzad pa'i don gyis na de nyid ni 'khor lo'o //
T02D1917:32b-26: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag
T02D1917:32b-27: chags yang dag par spangs pas dag pa gang yin
T02D1917:32b-28: pa de ni / sku dang gsung dang thugs shin tu dag ces bya'o //
T02D1917:32b-29: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes nye bar mtshon
T02D1917:32b-30: cing de thob bar byed pa'i theg pa ni rdo
T02D1917:32b-31: rje'i theg pa'o // rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu
T02D1917:32b-32: gyur cing mdzes pa'i don dang ldan pas na rgyal
T02D1917:32b-33: rje'i theg pa'o // po'o // nam mkha' ltar de
T02D1917:32b-34: bzhin du ro gcig pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad
T02D1917:32b-35: du khyab pas na thams cad nam mkha'o //
T02D1917:32b-36: de nyid kyis na 'di ni mi 'gyur mchog ste rtag pa'o //
T02D1917:32b-37: rin po che'i rigs kyi ngo bo bas na thams cad dbang bskur ro //
T02D1917:32b-38: rigs thams cad kyi don du gyur pas na kun gyi don te /
T02D1917:33a-0: @33a * // nam mkha' mdzod kyi gzugs kyis thams cad kyi don du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1917:33a-1: khams gsum ma lus pa'i chos kyi rgyal po mnyes pas na kun dbang ngo //
T02D1917:33a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog bshad du gsol zhes sbyar te /
T02D1917:33a-3: bdag med pa'i sbyor bas bskyed pas na mchog go ;
T02D1917:33a-5: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa //
T02D1917:33a-7: sku dang gsung dang thugs mtshan nyid gcig pa'i rdo
T02D1917:33a-8: rje gsum ni mi phyed pa'i de bzhin nyid de
T02D1917:33a-9: tshul de nyid kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rgyud
T02D1917:33a-10: la gnas pas gnas pa ste /
T02D1917:33a-11: 'dis ni shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid du gsungs pa'o //
T02D1917:33a-12: sku dang gsung dang thugs skal mchog / ces bya
T02D1917:33a-13: ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
T02D1917:33a-14: dang gsung dang thugs kyi skal ba mchog gi 'bras
T02D1917:33a-15: bu gang la mnga' ba de ni sku dang gsung
T02D1917:33a-16: dang thugs skal mchog ces bya ste /
T02D1917:33a-17: mchog tu gyur pa dngos por grub pa de stsol bar mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1917:33a-18: de nyid kyi phyir rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1917:33a-19: byol song skye gnas zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02D1917:33a-20: gang gi tshe rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge
T02D1917:33a-21: 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1917:33a-22: dbus su sbyor ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1917:33a-23: gzhan du ni ma yin te /
T02D1917:33a-24: des ni byol song gi skye gnas zhes bya ba
T02D1917:33a-25: klu'i bu mo bkug la de kho na nyid kyi
T02D1917:33a-27: gnas gang du brtsam par bya zhe na /
T02D1917:33a-28: sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa'am //
T02D1917:33a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1917:33a-30: mchod rten gyi gnas ni rgyal ba nyid skyes so //
T02D1917:33a-31: 'tshe ba thams cad dang bral ba ni zhi ba'i
T02D1917:33a-32: gnas rnams te tshig 'di ni gtsang sbra spyod pa
T02D1917:33a-34: gang bza' ba ma yin pa la za ba mngon
T02D1917:33a-35: par dga' ba de dag gi phyir bshang gci chu
T02D1917:33a-36: la sogs pas byugs pa'am zhes bya ba gsungs te
T02D1917:33a-37: / lam zhes bya ba'i sgras ni phyogs gzhan ston ba'o //
T02D1917:33a-38: des bu mo de la rang gi sngags dang phyag
T02D1917:33a-39: rgyas bsgrub par bya ba ni spyi gtsug gi gnas
T02D1917:33a-40: nas brtsams te / snying ga'i phyogs kyi bar du yi ge aom gyis khyab par bsam mo //
T02D1917:33a-41: snying ga nas brtsams te lte ba'i phyogs kyi bar du yi ge h'um gis so //
T02D1917:33a-42: lte ba'i phyogs nas rked pa'i phyogs kyi bar du yi ge sv'as so //
T02D1917:33b-0: gsang ba'i @33b gnas su ni yi ge a'a: sa so //
T02D1917:33b-1: gsang ba'i gnas kyi 'og gi cha nas rkang mthil
T02D1917:33b-2: gyi bar du ni yi ge h'as khyab par bsams
T02D1917:33b-3: te / de yang aom la sogs pa 'di dag
T02D1917:33b-4: ni gti mug la sogs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bor
T02D1917:33b-5: te / bsgom par bya'o // de'i phyir //
T02D1917:33b-6: rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya //
T02D1917:33b-8: / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1917:33b-9: rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten bsam //
T02D1917:33b-11: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni de bzhin
T02D1917:33b-12: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D1917:33b-13: kyi ngo bo'o // bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas par //
T02D1917:33b-14: mkhas par snying gar bsgom bar bya //
T02D1917:33b-16: bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang
T02D1917:33b-17: ldan pas mchod rten gyi dbus su chud pa'i rnam
T02D1917:33b-18: par snang mdzad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na
T02D1917:33b-20: sbyor ba'i dus su ni ba spu'i bu ga'i khung
T02D1917:33b-21: bu rnams las sangs rgyas kyi sprin sprul par bya
T02D1917:33b-22: zhing mthar bsdu bar yang bya'o ;
T02D1917:33b-24: zhes bya ba ni 'dod na zhes pa gang gi tshe bsgoms pas skyo bar 'gyur na'o //
T02D1917:33b-25: zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni zhi
T02D1917:33b-26: ba rdo rje ni sku rdo rje ste mi g-yeng
T02D1917:33b-27: ba'i sbyor bar 'dzin par byed pas na zhi ba
T02D1917:33b-29: rin chen sna bzhi ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1917:33b-32: don yod grub pa'i ngo bo'i rin po che bzhi ste /
T02D1917:33b-33: de bas na de'i ngo bor de rgyu dang 'dra
T02D1917:33b-34: bar mchod rten rin po che rnam bzhi'i rang bzhin
T02D1917:33b-35: no // 'od zer phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1917:33b-36: zhes bya ba ni rin po che lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1917:33b-37: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni rdul phra
T02D1917:33b-38: rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad las
T02D1917:33b-39: bsgrubs pas na de ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i
T02D1917:33b-41: de ltar gyur pa'i mchod rten de 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba ste /
T02D1917:33b-42: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bzhugs gnas yin pas na /
T02D1917:33b-43: gnas de yin par rnam par bshad //
T02D1917:33b-45: bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas //
T02D1917:33b-46: mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro //
T02D1917:33b-47: zhes bya ba ni me tog dang rin po che'i gos dang /
T02D1917:33b-49: rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa'i bkod pa'i
T02D1917:33b-50: sprin rnams sprul la des de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1917:34a-2: / mchod pa'i sprin de nyid rnam par dbye ba'i phyir /
T02D1917:34a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1917:34a-5: rnam pa lngar zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi dbye bas sngon po dang /
T02D1917:34a-9: ljang gu ste kha dog lngar bsam gtan gyi stobs
T02D1917:34a-10: kyis bskyed par bya ba ni shes par bya zhes
T02D1917:34a-11: bya'o // de bzhin du padma rnam pa lngar sprul la lha rnams la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1917:34a-12: dz'a ti rnam gsum shes byas nas //
T02D1917:34a-13: zhes pa ni kha dog sngon po dang ser po dang /
T02D1917:34a-15: dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du //
T02D1917:34a-17: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02D1917:34a-18: rnam par mkhas pas rtag tu ni //
T02D1917:34a-19: rigs ni rab tu dgod par bya //
T02D1917:34a-20: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil
T02D1917:34a-21: 'khor rnam par bsams pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad
T02D1917:34a-22: de / mchod rten gyi dbus su mchod pa'i phyir
T02D1917:34a-23: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhan dag
T02D1917:34a-24: kyang de'i rigs zlos pa rnams kyis de'i dbus su
T02D1917:34a-25: rnam par bsam zhing mchod par bya'o //
T02D1917:34a-26: de ltar mchod pa byas nas sngar gsungs pa'i rdo
T02D1917:34a-27: rje phra mo la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o zhes
T02D1917:34a-28: bya ba'i rim bzhin bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1917:34a-29: de bzhin padma'i rdo rje dang //
T02D1917:34a-30: ral gri autpala mkhas pas bsgom /
T02D1917:34a-32: 'di dag ni dpe tsam du blta bar bya'o //
T02D1917:34a-33: de lta bu'i mchod rten gyi dbus su dkyil 'khor
T02D1917:34a-34: rnam par bsams la yid kyis mchod pa nyin re
T02D1917:34a-35: zhing thun mtshams so sor byas la bsgom pa thams
T02D1917:34a-37: mchod rten de'i gzugs dang dbyibs dang tshad ni dzi tsam /
T02D1917:34a-38: kha dog ni ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1917:34a-40: dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam la //
T02D1917:34a-41: zhes pas ni tshad bstan to //
T02D1917:34a-42: gru bzhi zhes bya ba ni dbyibs so //
T02D1917:34a-43: gsal zhing zhes bya ba ni kha dog go //
T02D1917:34a-44: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang /
T02D1917:34a-49: de rnams kyi zhe sdang la sogs pa'i rigs rnams la'o //
T02D1917:34a-50: mchod pa rgya mtsho tsam zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i rgya mtsho bya'o //
T02D1917:34a-51: phyi'i mchod pa med kyang thun bzhir rin po che
T02D1917:34a-52: sna bzhi'i mchod rten rnam par bsams la de'i dbus
T02D1917:34a-53: su rang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsams te
T02D1917:34b-3: rol sogs pa rnams kyis nam mkha' ma lus pa bkang la /
T02D1917:34b-4: rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya ste /
T02D1917:34b-5: don de nyid bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1917:34b-6: rin chen na bza' la sogs pas //
T02D1917:34b-7: byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod //
T02D1917:34b-9: yid nyid kyis mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang bdud
T02D1917:34b-10: rtsi rnam pa lnga'i ngo bo dang yid de nyid
T02D1917:34b-11: kyis bu mo dag rin po che'i rigs grub pa'i
T02D1917:34b-13: rin po che sna bdun thams cad kyang de bzhin
T02D1917:34b-14: du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi sbyor
T02D1917:34b-15: bas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi ngo
T02D1917:34b-17: dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su 'dug la m'a ma k'i
T02D1917:34b-18: la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bsgoms te mchod par bya'o
T02D1917:34b-20: bdag po'i phyag rgya mnyam gzhag la //
T02D1917:34b-21: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu //
T02D1917:34b-22: 'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la //
T02D1917:34b-23: reg pa'i sbyor bas dbul bar bya //
T02D1917:34b-25: yang dag par sbyor ba bsgoms pas 'dul bar gyur
T02D1917:34b-26: pa rnams kyi sbyor ba lta bu'i shes rab ni
T02D1917:34b-28: gang la de yod pa ni 'dod chags blo can no //
T02D1917:34b-29: 'dod chags kyi blo can de rnams kyis 'di ltar nyin re zhing yid kyis mchod pa byas la /
T02D1917:34b-30: rdo rje phra mo la sogs pa bsgoms pas sems
T02D1917:34b-31: brtan par byas nas brtul zhugs yun ring du yang
T02D1917:34b-32: dag par spyad nas lha'i bu mo la sogs pa
T02D1917:34b-33: sems dang lhan cig tu de kho na nyid kyis
T02D1917:34b-34: mchod pa bya'o // mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas //
T02D1917:34b-35: zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe rang gi lha'i
T02D1917:34b-36: gzugs bsgom pa mngon sum bzhin du mthong zhing bdag
T02D1917:34b-37: gis mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam
T02D1917:34b-38: par rtog pa mi 'byung ba dang rdzas de dag
T02D1917:34b-39: sku dang gsung dang thugs su bsgoms pas sku dang
T02D1917:34b-40: gsung dang thugs rdo rjer gyur cing rab tu 'bar
T02D1917:34b-41: bar mthong ba de tsam gyis blo brtan par 'gyur
T02D1917:34b-42: ba yin no // le'u brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1917:34b-44: // / srog gcod pa dang ma byin bar len pa
T02D1917:34b-45: dang bud med bsten pa dang brdzun du smra ba
T02D1917:34b-46: la dga' ba rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gang
T02D1917:34b-47: gsungs pa de ni sgra ji bzhin par gzung bar
T02D1917:34b-48: mi bya ste / gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pas
T02D1917:34b-49: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sbyor bas sgrub ba lan
T02D1917:34b-50: bdun byas kyang 'grub par ma gyur na /
T02D1917:35a-1: pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1917:35a-2: gyis rnal 'byor sgrib pa rnams rab tu spang bar
T02D1917:35a-3: bya'o zhes rab tu bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1917:35a-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa don dam
T02D1917:35a-5: pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gi le'u
T02D1917:35a-6: gsungs so // sku gsung thugs la longs spyod pas bshad du gsol zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02D1917:35a-7: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'o //
T02D1917:35a-8: longs spyod pa ni dkyil 'khor gang du sku dang gsung dang thugs de dang sbyar ba'o //
T02D1917:35a-9: dkyil 'khor rdo rje mi phyed gsum //
T02D1917:35a-10: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje yang yid la mi
T02D1917:35a-11: phyed pa yang yin pas na rdo rje mi phyed
T02D1917:35a-13: sangs rgyas ye shes can gyi zhes bya ba ni
T02D1917:35a-14: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni sangs rgyas ye
T02D1917:35a-15: shes te / de gang la yod pa de ni sangs rgyas ye shes can te /
T02D1917:35a-16: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1917:35a-17: gsang zhes bya ba ni shin tu gsang bar gyur pa ste /
T02D1917:35a-18: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'o //
T02D1917:35a-19: nyams dga' zhes bya ba ni yid dang rjes su mthun zhing dga' bar byed pas so //
T02D1917:35a-21: da ni de dag nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1917:35a-22: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1917:35a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1917:35a-24: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus na gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsams la /
T02D1917:35a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gnas su mi bskyod pa'i sku bsam mo //
T02D1917:35a-26: de nas ji skad gsungs pa'i rdo rje de rnams kyi phyag tu bsgoms te /
T02D1917:35a-27: de 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar
T02D1917:35a-28: byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi snang bar
T02D1917:35a-29: bya'o // de lta bu'i bsam gtan gyi rdo rjes
T02D1917:35a-30: sems can rnams bsad pa ni 'dir srog gcod pa
T02D1917:35a-31: bya'o // zhes bya'i / gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T02D1917:35a-33: mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu //
T02D1917:35a-34: rgyal ba'i sras rnams skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1917:35a-36: bsam gtan gyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'dis gang dag
T02D1917:35a-37: gi lus dang ngag dang yid mi dmigs shing stong
T02D1917:35a-38: pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin du gyur pa de
T02D1917:35a-39: ni mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye
T02D1917:35a-41: ye shes ni gti mug gi rigs kyi mnyam pa nyid du nges pa ste /
T02D1917:35a-42: des thar pa rab tu bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1917:35b-0: chos @35b thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes
T02D1917:35b-1: bsgom pa ni ngo bo nyid dag dgos pa med
T02D1917:35b-2: ces bya'o // de lta bu'i byang chub kyi spyod pa der rab tu ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1917:35b-3: yang dag dam tshig bka' stsal to //
T02D1917:35b-4: zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1917:35b-6: sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa'i //
T02D1917:35b-9: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1917:35b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1917:35b-11: sku rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1917:35b-12: rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te //
T02D1917:35b-13: zhes bya ba ni dbus su'o //
T02D1917:35b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom //
T02D1917:35b-15: zhes pa ni phyogs bzhir mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1917:35b-16: rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1917:35b-17: zhes pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad rigs lnga'i ngo bo nyid du bsgom pa'o //
T02D1917:35b-19: rdo rje'i gzugs ni rab tu brtag / ces bya
T02D1917:35b-20: ba la rdo rje'i gzugs ni rigs lnga'i sku gsung
T02D1917:35b-21: thugs so // 'dis ni sems can gyi khams thams cad rigs lnga'i ngo bor bsgoms pas /
T02D1917:35b-22: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams kyi khams
T02D1917:35b-23: gsum pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rdzas phrogs pa ni
T02D1917:35b-24: gzhan gyi rdzas 'phrog pa zhes bya'i /
T02D1917:35b-25: phyi rol gyi ni ma yin no zhes rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1917:35b-26: nor rnams thams cad phrogs nas su //
T02D1917:35b-27: rdo rje gsum du rnam bsgoms na //
T02D1917:35b-29: khams gsum pa lta bu'i rnam par rtog ba ni nor thams cad de /
T02D1917:35b-30: de rdo rje gsum gyis zhes pa ni lus la lus med pa la sogs par bsgoms pas so //
T02D1917:35b-32: nor gyi rgya mtsho gang ba yi //
T02D1917:35b-35: ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsams pa thams
T02D1917:35b-36: cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du
T02D1917:35b-37: de yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'thob
T02D1917:35b-39: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1917:35b-40: dkyil 'khor rab tu bka' stsal to //
T02D1917:35b-42: 'dod chags thar pa rab bsgrub pa //
T02D1917:35b-43: zhes bya ba la yang dag par sbyor ba bsgom pa la chags pa ni 'dod chags so //
T02D1917:35b-44: des thar par 'gyur bas na 'dod chags thar ba ste /
T02D1917:36a-1: rab tu sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni gsal ba'o //
T02D1917:36a-2: ma chags pas na dag pa'o //
T02D1917:36a-3: de la'ang mi nye bar mi dmigs pas na dmigs med pa'o //
T02D1917:36a-5: zhes bya ba ni padma r'a ga lta bu'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1917:36a-6: dpag med tshe ni rab bsgoms te ;
T02D1917:36a-7: / sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad dgang //
T02D1917:36a-8: zhes bya ba ni sngar gsungs pa'i bsam gtan gyi
T02D1917:36a-9: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'od dpag med du bdag
T02D1917:36a-10: nyid bsgoms te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gnas
T02D1917:36a-11: ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag la de bzhin gshegs
T02D1917:36a-12: pa thams cad 'dus par bsam mo //
T02D1917:36a-13: bud med lta bur sbyor ba ni //
T02D1917:36a-14: zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo la sogs pa ste /
T02D1917:36a-15: de rnams dang lhan cig yang dag par sbyor bar bsam pa'o //
T02D1917:36a-17: dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1917:36a-18: thams cad de ru bsgom par bya //
T02D1917:36a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab
T02D1917:36a-21: dang mnyam pa'i 'od dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor du
T02D1917:36a-22: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D1917:36a-23: pa bzhi po'i sbyor ba ni dam tshig bzhi'i sbyor
T02D1917:36a-24: ba'o // dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas //
T02D1917:36a-25: de dag thams cad nye bar spyad //
T02D1917:36a-26: ces bya ba ni 'od dpag med kyi sbyor ba
T02D1917:36a-27: ba'i ngo bor bdag nyid bsgom pa 'ba' zhig tu
T02D1917:36a-28: ma zad kyi dam tshig bzhi'i sbyor bas kyang sngags
T02D1917:36a-29: thams cad la sbyor bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1917:36a-30: to // mi phyed sku gsum bsgom pa'o //
T02D1917:36a-31: zhes pa ni ji ltar 'od dpag tu med pa'i
T02D1917:36a-32: sbyor ba la dam tshig bzhi'i sbyor bas bsgom pa
T02D1917:36a-33: de bzhin du / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1917:36a-34: sbyor ba la yang bya bar bstan pa'i phyir te
T02D1917:36a-35: de bzhin du / / mi phyed pa'i rdo rje
T02D1917:36a-36: gsum bsgrub pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo
T02D1917:36a-37: rje la mi g-yeng ba'i sbyor ba bsgom pa'o //
T02D1917:36a-38: de lta bu'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba bsgom pa'i
T02D1917:36a-39: mtshan nyid la 'dir bud med bsten pa'i zhes bya'i
T02D1917:36a-40: / phyi rol gyi yang yin pas ni sangs rgyas
T02D1917:36a-41: nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya
T02D1917:36a-42: / bar ston to // chos rnams thams cad ma skyes shing //
T02D1917:36a-43: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba //
T02D1917:36a-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ston pa ni 'dir
T02D1917:36a-45: brdzun du smra bar bzhed de de bsten par bya
T02D1917:36a-46: ba'i phyir // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1917:36b-0: @36b zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1917:36b-1: sngar gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1917:36b-2: dbus sa don yod grub pa'i skur bdag nyid bsams
T02D1917:36b-3: la / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
T02D1917:36b-4: phra rab dang mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnam par
T02D1917:36b-5: bsams la 'di ltar bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1917:36b-6: thams cad gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas //
T02D1917:36b-7: rdo rje tshig gi brdzun smra bas //
T02D1917:36b-8: zhes bya ba ni 'dir brdzun du smra ba ni /
T02D1917:36b-9: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02D1917:36b-10: gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1917:36b-11: byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med //
T02D1917:36b-12: ces bya ba la sogs par dgongs so /
T02D1917:36b-14: de yang lha'i bu ngas chos thams cad brdzun par shes shing de bzhin du ston te /
T02D1917:36b-15: des nang ni brdzun du smra ba'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1917:36b-16: 'di dag gi gnas ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /
T02D1917:36b-17: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste /
T02D1917:36b-18: rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi dang /
T02D1917:36b-19: de bzhin du me long lta bu dang /
T02D1917:36b-23: ye shes bzhi dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D1917:36b-26: las kyi rigs rnams yin no zhes ston to //
T02D1917:36b-27: rdo rje mi phyed gsum rgyal gnas //
T02D1917:36b-28: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje yang yin la mi
T02D1917:36b-29: phyed pa yang yin pas na rdo rje mi phyed
T02D1917:36b-30: rnam gsum mo // rgyal ba rnams kyi gnas yin pas na rgyal gnas te /
T02D1917:36b-31: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs bzhugs pas so //
T02D1917:36b-32: dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1917:36b-33: zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1917:36b-34: de yi dbus su dkon mchog dpal //
T02D1917:36b-35: zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1917:36b-36: gzugs rnams kun gyis 'di dag dgang //
T02D1917:36b-37: zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs sgom pa'i
T02D1917:36b-38: rnal 'byor pas thams cad rin po che'i rigs kyi
T02D1917:36b-39: lha'i gzugs kyis nam mkha' 'di dag thams cad ma
T02D1917:36b-41: khro bo'i sngags zlos pas kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam
T02D1917:36b-42: pa'i rin po che'i rigs kyi chos nyid rnam par
T02D1917:36b-43: bsams te / khro bo'i gzugs kyis nam mkha' bkang
T02D1917:36b-44: la mngon sum sogs pa bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1917:36b-45: bsams te / // rtsub mo'i dag la sogs pa ni //
T02D1917:36b-46: bstan dang ye shes thob par 'gyur //
T02D1917:37a-1: choms shig sod cig skrod cig h'um phat ces bya ba'i tshig ni rtsub mo'i ngag ces bya'o //
T02D1917:37a-2: ngo mtshar du gyur zhes bya ba ni yon por
T02D1917:37a-3: gsungs pas chos rnams kyi de nyid ston pa thos
T02D1917:37a-4: so // rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci yi slad du gsungs //
T02D1917:37a-5: zhes bya ba la ci'i slad du zhes bya ba'i sgra ni zlog ste /
T02D1917:37a-6: byis pa rnams skrag par bgyid lags pas gsung 'di
T02D1917:37a-7: lta bu 'dis stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam
T02D1917:37a-8: par thar ba'i sgo'i ngo bo'i chos nyid bstan par
T02D1917:37a-9: mi bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1917:37a-10: de nyid kyi phyir khams gsum las 'das shing zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1917:37a-11: khams gsum po dag las 'das par gyur pa'o //
T02D1917:37a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las 'das pas zhes
T02D1917:37a-13: bya ba ni khams gsum gcig las 'das pa nyid
T02D1917:37a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las 'das pa yin
T02D1917:37a-15: te / khams gsum gcig gi chos nyid gang yin
T02D1917:37a-16: pa de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi chos
T02D1917:37a-18: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gi lam rdo
T02D1917:37a-19: rje'i tshig ces bya ba la yang dag pa'i bden
T02D1917:37a-20: pa'o // bden pa ma yin pas yang dag pa ma yin pa ste /
T02D1917:37a-21: de ston pa'i tshig ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig go //
T02D1917:37a-22: de'i lam ni rnam par thar ba'i sgo bzhi'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1917:37a-23: de nyid rdo rje'i tshig ste rnam par thar pa'i
T02D1917:37a-24: sgo bzhi bsgoms pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1917:37a-26: de nyid gnas su gyur pa'i phyir rdo rje'i tshig ces bya ba'o //
T02D1917:37a-27: rigs kyi bu dman pa'i 'du shes dang smad pa'i
T02D1917:37a-28: 'du shes 'di lta bu ma skyed cig / ces

T02D1917:40a-41: 'da' bar mdzad pa dang 'chi bar 'gyur ba mi

T02D1917:40a-44: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs //

T02D1917:40b-0: rje rdzogs pa @40b ste yongs su rdzogs par bsgrub
T02D1917:40b-1: pa'o // rang gi lha'i sbyor ba rnam par bsgoms

T02D1917:40b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i thugs kar dkyil
T02D1917:40b-14: 'khor rnam par bsam pa dang snying pos kun nas

T02D1917:40b-19: po'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam pa'i sbyor ba'i bsgom
T02D1917:40b-20: pa ni / rig ma dbang phyug zhugs pa la //
T02D1917:40b-21: rdo rje sbyor ba rab bsgom zhing //

T02D1917:40b-26: par bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag mar

T02D1917:40b-28: zhes bya ba ni rig ma'i dbang phyug mo dang sbyor ba'i dus so //

T02D1917:40b-30: kyi gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi

T02D1917:41a-24: phyag rgya chen por rnam bsgom pa //

T02D1917:41a-38: aom ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T02D1917:41b-32: 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge a'a: bsgom par bya'o

T02D1917:42a-7: snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi //

T02D1917:42a-13: sku gsung thugs ni mnyes byed pa //

T02D1917:42a-29: 'gyur ba dang sangs rgyas nyid ni 'di'i 'bras bu'o

T02D1917:42a-31: zhes bya ba ni yi ge aom la sogs pa

T02D1917:42a-33: ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D1917:43a-1: rdo rje chen po bsam par bya //

T02D1917:43a-36: cad zhugs la / // de ltar na yi ge

T02D1917:43a-39: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //

T02D1917:43b-18: ba dang lus dang snying ga rnams su mngon par

T02D1917:43b-27: rnam par snang mdzad dang gtsug tor gyi sbyor bas

T02D1917:43b-31: shes pa lnga'i sbyor bas bsgom mo //
T02D1917:43b-32: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pa'am gtsug tor

T02D1917:43b-35: ldan pa'i 'khor lo bdag nyid rnam par bsams la

T02D1917:44a-4: rdo rje mi bskyod rab tu bsgom //

T02D1917:44a-9: bsgom par bya'o // de bzhin du 'od dpag med

T02D1917:44a-15: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1917:44a-16: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1917:44a-17: lus ngag sems la yi ge aom //
T02D1917:44a-18: zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i rdo rje dang lce dang lus thams cad la'o //
T02D1917:44a-19: de bzhin du 'od dpag med kyi sbyor bas 'od
T02D1917:44a-20: dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ji lta
T02D1917:44a-22: yi ge a'a: sa lus la sogs pa stong par bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1917:44a-23: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni mi bskyod pa dang rdo
T02D1917:44a-24: rje 'chang chen po'i dkyil 'khor te de dag gi

T02D1917:44a-30: le'u bcu gcig pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1917:44a-32: // / ji skad gsungs pa'i 'bras bu grub pa'i phyir
T02D1917:44a-33: lha'i sbyor ba byas la sku dang gsung dang thugs

T02D1917:44a-37: sbyor ba dam tshig bsgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i le'u
T02D1917:44a-38: gsungs so // mtho ris dang thar pa thob pa'i
T02D1917:44a-39: phyir sems can gyi khams la ston pas ston pa'o
T02D1917:44a-40: gsungs so // // sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa stsol zhing 'byin pas na bskyed pa'o //
T02D1917:44a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni ye shes mchog ste /
T02D1917:44a-42: de bsgrub cing rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir ye shes mchog bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1917:44b-0: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni dam tshig rdo rje @44b gsum mo //
T02D1917:44b-1: de dag gi de kho na nyid ni rdo rje gsung ste /
T02D1917:44b-2: bka' stsal pa ni gsungs pa'o //
T02D1917:44b-3: mkha' dang mtshungs dang dam tshig 'byung //
T02D1917:44b-4: rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom //
T02D1917:44b-6: 'byung bar 'gyur bas na 'byung ba ste sems can no //
T02D1917:44b-7: sems can de rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni nam
T02D1917:44b-8: mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam pas na nam mkha' dang
T02D1917:44b-9: mtshungs pa dang rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa
T02D1917:44b-10: thams cad dang bral zhing don dam par skye ba
T02D1917:44b-11: med pa'o // de nyid kyi phyir //
T02D1917:44b-12: chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa las //
T02D1917:44b-14: ma skyes pa de nyid kyis ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yin no //
T02D1917:44b-15: rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom //
T02D1917:44b-16: zhes bya ba ni 'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs
T02D1917:44b-17: pa bsgom pa'i ngo bo'i gnas bshad pa'i yi ge
T02D1917:44b-18: mam las sngar gsungs pa'i tshul du 'phags pa 'jam
T02D1917:44b-19: dpal du bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms te /
T02D1917:44b-20: lus dang ngag dang sems la yi ge mam bkod
T02D1917:44b-21: nas rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la
T02D1917:44b-22: 'jam pa'i dbyangs rab tu bsgoms na 'jam pa'i dbyangs
T02D1917:44b-24: rdo rje phra mo bsgoms pas sems brtan par byas
T02D1917:44b-25: la bdud rtsi lnga po yi ge mam gyis 'phags
T02D1917:44b-26: pa 'jam dpal gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs su
T02D1917:44b-27: bsgoms pas rab tu 'bar ba de las ri lur
T02D1917:44b-28: byas la lcags gsum gyis dkris te khar bcug na
T02D1917:44b-29: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D1917:44b-30: kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin du 'grub par

T02D1917:44b-32: chen po'i sbyor ba dag la ni yi ge aom
T02D1917:44b-33: mam yi ge bhr'um las rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi

T02D1917:44b-36: gnas su bsgoms na grub par gyur nas sangs rgyas
T02D1917:44b-37: thams cad dang mnyam bar 'gyur ro //

T02D1917:44b-39: sbyor bas rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi
T02D1917:44b-40: ge h'um las bdag nyid rdo rje'i rigs thams cad
T02D1917:44b-41: kyi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen por rnam par
T02D1917:44b-43: bsgom pa 'dis grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni thugs rdo rje dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1917:45a-0: 'od dpag med kyi sbyor ba'am rdo rje chos kyi @45a * //
T02D1917:45a-1: sbyor bas rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug
T02D1917:45a-2: la yi ge a'a: las bdag nyid padma'i rigs thams
T02D1917:45a-3: cad kyi rdul phra rab las bsgrubs pa'i padma 'dab
T02D1917:45a-6: 'od zer sna lnga'i mdog 'dra'i mdog / rang gi sngags kyis ral gri bsgom //
T02D1917:45a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa don yod grub pa'i
T02D1917:45a-8: sbyor bas don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D1917:45a-9: su 'dug la rang gi sngags las lag pa g-yas

T02D1917:45a-13: 'byor bas rang gi lha'i gzugs lcags gsum gyis dkris

T02D1917:45a-15: la / aom gyi ngo bor rnam par bsams te

T02D1917:45a-17: sku ri lu'i nang du zhugs par bsgoms na 'grub

T02D1917:45a-19: chags dang zhe sdang gi rigs dag la yang rang
T02D1917:45a-20: gi lha'i sbyor bas yi ge a'a: dang yi ge
T02D1917:45a-21: h'um dag las ri lu bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1917:45a-22: mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dkyil gnas pa //
T02D1917:45a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnam par snang
T02D1917:45a-24: mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la dkar por bsams

T02D1917:45a-28: // mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa //
T02D1917:45a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nam mkha'i dbyings rdo rje'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsams la /

T02D1917:45a-31: su ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug la yi ge

T02D1917:45a-34: // mkha' dbyings rin chen dbus gnas pa //

T02D1917:45a-36: po che'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsams la de'i
T02D1917:45a-37: steng du rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed
T02D1917:45a-38: la ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du bsgoms na rin
T02D1917:45a-39: po che'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02D1917:45a-40: de bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings padma'i rang bzhin du

T02D1917:45b-0: du bsgoms pas ni padma'i @45b rig pa 'dzin pa
T02D1917:45b-2: nam mkha'i dbyings ral gri'i rang bzhin du bsgoms nas
T02D1917:45b-3: de'i steng du don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ji
T02D1917:45b-4: lta ba bzhin du bsgoms pas ni ral gri'i rig
T02D1917:45b-5: pa 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1917:45b-6: de bzhin du rtse gsum dang kyo ba tang la
T02D1917:45b-7: sogs bsgrub pa ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i sbyor
T02D1917:45b-9: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du dbus su
T02D1917:45b-10: sbyor ba gsum rigs kyi skyes bu rdo rje sems
T02D1917:45b-11: dpa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid
T02D1917:45b-12: bsams nas / aom a'a: h'um ste 'di dag las

T02D1917:45b-14: rje'i rdul phra rab rnams las bsgrub pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D1917:45b-16: mtshan ma thob nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bzhag
T02D1917:45b-17: pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' lcags kyu des bkug la
T02D1917:45b-18: rang gis bsgoms pa la sbyar ro //

T02D1917:45b-26: don to // de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1917:45b-27: kyi dkyil 'khor du 'dug ste rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1917:45b-28: kyi sbyor bas yi ge aom las de bzhin gshegs
T02D1917:45b-29: pa thams cad kyi rdul phra rab las bsgrubs pa
T02D1917:45b-30: las 'khor lo'i lcags kyu lag pa g-yas par bsgoms
T02D1917:45b-31: la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dgug par
T02D1917:45b-32: don to // bya'o // de bzhin du 'od dpag
T02D1917:45b-33: med kyi rnal 'byor pas 'od dpag med kyi dkyil
T02D1917:45b-34: 'khor gyi dbus su ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug
T02D1917:45b-35: ste yi ge a'a: las lcags kyu padma rigs kyi
T02D1917:45b-36: gzugs su rnam par bsams la 'od dpag med la

T02D1917:45b-42: sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la //

T02D1917:45b-45: sku dang ldan pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D1917:46a-1: pa'i skur bdag nyid rnam par bsams la lcags kyu la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1917:46a-2: rnam pa mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i //
T02D1917:46a-3: rdo rje sku ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1917:46a-4: rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms pas rnam par snang mdzad lta bur 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1917:46a-5: snga ma las 'dir yang rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D1917:46a-6: sogs pa'i sbyor bas lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyi'i
T02D1917:46a-7: dngos grub bsgrub pa ste 'di ni khyad par ro
T02D1917:46a-8: // rdo rje sbyor bas lce bsgoms na //
T02D1917:46a-9: zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs bsgoms na /
T02D1917:46a-10: gsung rdo rje dang mnyam par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1917:46a-11: gsang gsum dam tshig mchod pa'i mchog /

T02D1917:46a-13: ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang
T02D1917:46a-14: chen po dang mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen po
T02D1917:46a-15: ni gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi mchog go
T02D1917:46a-16: // de nyid bsgrub pa'i ngo bo bas mchod pa ste /

T02D1917:46a-20: sgrub pa gsungs nas da ni bza' ba ma yin
T02D1917:46a-21: pa'i za bdag gi yang bstan pa'i phyir sha chen
T02D1917:46a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1917:46a-23: rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya //
T02D1917:46a-24: zhes bya ba ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi ste

T02D1917:46a-26: ma yin pa bza' bar bya'o //

T02D1917:46a-28: thams cad bsam pas rnam par brtag / ces bya

T02D1917:46a-42: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 'gyur ba //
T02D1917:46b-0: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i @46b sbyor ba'am mi bskyod
T02D1917:46b-1: pa'i sbyor bas yi ge h'um rang gi lce la

T02D1917:49b-17: bya'o // gsung rdo rje ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs ba ste /
T02D1917:49b-18: ye shes rdo rje'i zhes bya ba ni gsung rdo rje'i don bsgoms pas so //
T02D1917:49b-19: de ltar so so'i bstan nas /
T02D1917:49b-20: da ni re re'i sbyor ba la yang sku dang
T02D1917:49b-21: gsung dang thugs spro ba ni yang na zhes bya
T02D1917:49b-22: ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1917:49b-23: ye shes sems kyis zhes bya ba ni bsgom ba'i sems so //
T02D1917:49b-24: ci 'di 'ba' zhig gis sa ma zhe na //
T02D1917:49b-25: gdod nas rdo rje spro ba ni //
T02D1917:49b-27: rang gi sngags brjod nas spros pas nam mkha' 'di dag thams cad khyab pa'o //
T02D1917:49b-29: rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya //
T02D1917:49b-31: da ni sku la sogs pa'i bsgom pa gsungs pa ni ;
T02D1917:49b-32: / sku yi rdo rje rdzogs byang chub //
T02D1917:49b-33: dngos dang dngos med rnams dpyad pa //
T02D1917:49b-35: lus la lus med par bsgom pa ni sku rdo rje'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o //
T02D1917:49b-36: sgra rnams brag ca dang 'dra bar bsgom pa ni sgra la sgra med par rnam par dpyad pa'o //
T02D1917:49b-37: gnas pa'i rdo rje rnam dpyad pa //
T02D1917:49b-38: zhes bya ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje ni de bzhin du ro gcig pa'i ye shes bsgom pa'o //
T02D1917:49b-39: don rtogs pa'i bzlas pa ni rin po che'i rigs
T02D1917:49b-40: kyi sngags nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsgom pa ni
T02D1917:49b-41: don rtogs pa ste de nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1917:49b-42: ngo bo nyid med bzang po yin //
T02D1917:50a-0: dus gsum dag la rnam brtag @50a * //
T02D1917:50a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dngos po med par
T02D1917:50a-4: bsgom pa 'di ni rin po che'i rigs kyi bzlas
T02D1917:50a-6: sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du //
T02D1917:50a-7: zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i rigs kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02D1917:50a-8: h'um dang bcas pa dang phat dang bcas pa'i sgra thos par khro bo'i bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1917:50a-9: 'dod pa'i don gyis zhes bya ba ni byang chub chen po thob pa'i don gyis so //
T02D1917:50a-10: myos gyur pa zhes bya ba ni de la 'bebs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1917:50a-11: kun du skyob cing phan par dga' //
T02D1917:50a-12: zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi bde bas tshim par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1917:50a-13: sems can rgya mtsho gnas pa ni //
T02D1917:50a-14: zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi rigs thams cad
T02D1917:50a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rigs su nges par byas pa
T02D1917:50a-16: la dga' ba bskyed de bzlas brjod bya ba'o //
T02D1917:50a-17: padma'i rigs kyi ngo bor 'jig rten gyi khams thams
T02D1917:50a-18: cad rnam par bsams la snying rje chen po'i chags
T02D1917:50a-20: bcos ma'i khro bo bskyed pa ni thabs dang snying
T02D1917:50a-21: rje'i zhe sdang ste de las byung ba ni skyed
T02D1917:50a-22: pa ste / des sems can thams cad zhe sdang
T02D1917:50a-23: gi rigs su rnam par bsams te bzlas pa bya'o
T02D1917:50a-24: pa ste / // dam tshig yang dag rdo rje gsum //
T02D1917:50a-25: dbu ma zhes pa ni gang yang khro bo la
T02D1917:50a-26: sogs pa'i ngo bor ma gyur pa'i byang chub sems
T02D1917:50a-27: dpa' de dag gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
T02D1917:50a-28: ngo bor lhag par mos pa'o //
T02D1917:50a-29: 'dod chags yang dag ces bya ba ni sbyor ba bsgom pa'i chags pa ni 'dod chags so //
T02D1917:50a-30: de'i yang dag pa nyid ni 'dod chags yang dag pa ste /
T02D1917:50a-31: don dam par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1917:50a-32: rdo rje bdag po zhes bya ba ni rigs lnga'i bdag po'o //
T02D1917:50a-33: 'dod chags byang chub rdzogs par mdzad //
T02D1917:50a-34: ces bya ba ni mig yor tsam du sbyor ba'i
T02D1917:50a-35: bsgom pas byang chub par gdul bya'i rgyud la sgrub
T02D1917:50a-36: par mdzad pa'o // rigs pa chen po spyan la sogs //
T02D1917:50a-37: rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa //
T02D1917:50a-38: zhes bya ba la 'dod pa ni byang chub tu
T02D1917:50a-39: sbyor ba'i bsgom pa ste spyan la sogs pas ni
T02D1917:50a-40: de'i don du sbyor ba'i bsgom pa'i ngo bor don
T02D1917:50a-41: dam par de la brtson zhing rtag 'grus su byed
T02D1917:50a-42: pa'o // 'dod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba ni
T02D1917:50a-43: thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bor sbyor ba bsgom
T02D1917:50a-44: pa'o // ba'o // khro bo'i zlos pa po rnams
T02D1917:50b-0: @50b kyis yid kyis gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar
T02D1917:50b-2: rnam par snang mdzad kyi zlos pa pos ni rang
T02D1917:50b-3: gi snying gar 'khor lo rnam par bsams te 'khor
T02D1917:50b-4: lo'i lte bar rang gi sngags gnas par bya ste
T02D1917:50b-6: zhe sdang gi rigs zlos pa rnams kyis ni rang
T02D1917:50b-7: gi snying ga'i rdo rje la sngags rnam par dgod
T02D1917:50b-8: do // rin po che'i rigs zlos pas na rin po che la'o //
T02D1917:50b-9: padma'i rigs zlos pas ni padma la'o //
T02D1917:50b-10: don yod grub pa'i rigs zlos pas ni rang gi
T02D1917:50b-11: snying ga'i ral gri la sngags rnams rnam par bkod
T02D1917:50b-13: dkyil 'khor kun gyi ngos rnams su //
T02D1917:50b-14: zhes bya ba ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi dbus su'o //
T02D1917:50b-15: 'od zer lnga yi bye brag gis //
T02D1917:50b-16: zhes bya ba ni mdog nag po dang dkar po
T02D1917:50b-17: dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'i 'od
T02D1917:50b-18: zer lnga ste / de bzhin gshegs pa re re
T02D1917:50b-19: la yang 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa rang gi
T02D1917:50b-20: ba spu'i bu ga rnams nas sbrul te /
T02D1917:50b-21: sangs rgyas kyi skus nam mkha' khyab par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1917:50b-22: sngags rnams thams cad spro ba ne //
T02D1917:50b-23: bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bsgrags //
T02D1917:50b-24: zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sbyor ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02D1917:50b-25: sku gsum rdo rje bye brag gis //
T02D1917:50b-26: spro ba dang ni bsdu ba bya //
T02D1917:50b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lus la lus med pa la sogs pa bsgoms pas so //
T02D1917:50b-29: lus kyi sku yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1917:50b-30: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1917:50b-32: rdo rje lnga rnams bsgoms par bya //
T02D1917:50b-33: zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam
T02D1917:50b-34: par bsams la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa gnas
T02D1917:50b-35: lnga rnams su rang gi lha'i sku bsam par bya'o
T02D1917:50b-37: dbus su bdag po bsam nas ni //
T02D1917:50b-38: sku gsung rdo rje rang gi gzugs //
T02D1917:50b-39: rang sngags rdo rje'i gzugs dag gis //
T02D1917:50b-40: dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag tu //
T02D1917:50b-42: kha dog rnam bzhir kun brtags la ;
T02D1917:50b-43: / zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku mdog ste /
T02D1917:50b-44: dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang nag por rang gi lha'i skur bsam par bya'o //
T02D1917:50b-45: de nas ni snying gar rang gi sngags kyi don bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1917:50b-46: de lta bu des cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1917:50b-47: rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yis las /
T02D1917:51a-3: 'di skad ston te zhi ba'i las byed par 'dod
T02D1917:51a-4: na rang gi lha'i sku mdog dkar por bsam par
T02D1917:51a-5: bya'o // rgyas pa la ni ser por ro //
T02D1917:51a-6: dbang la ni dmar por ro //
T02D1917:51a-7: gdug pa la ni nag por ro //
T02D1917:51a-8: yang na zhi ba la ni sbyan no //
T02D1917:51a-9: rgyas pa la ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis so //
T02D1917:51a-10: dbang la ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis so //
T02D1917:51a-11: gdug pa'i las la ni khro bos bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1917:51a-12: gdug pa'i las ni slob dpon la smod pa dang /
T02D1917:51a-13: sems can thams cad mang po dang dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa la bya ste /
T02D1917:51a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam
T02D1917:51a-15: pa'i snyed kyi sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi skur
T02D1917:51a-16: bsgoms la / slob dpon smod pa la sogs pas bsad par rnam par bsams la /
T02D1917:51a-17: gdug pa rnams gsod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas mang
T02D1917:51a-18: pos gsod pa yin no zhes khro bo bskyed pa
T02D1917:51a-19: la khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje
T02D1917:51a-20: 'chang chen po rdo rje rtse lnga pa las byung
T02D1917:51a-21: ba zhal bzhi pa phyag drug pa rdo rje chen
T02D1917:51a-22: po bsnams pa / khros par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02D1917:51a-23: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab
T02D1917:51a-24: dang mnyam pa'i 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang
T02D1917:51a-25: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1917:51a-26: rnam lag pa g-yas na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar
T02D1917:51a-27: ba'i nang du chud par bsams la /
T02D1917:51a-28: rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi snang bas sems can gyi
T02D1917:51a-29: khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil
T02D1917:51a-30: 'khor gyi ngo bor byas la rang gi lus la
T02D1917:51a-32: de nas rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'jig rten
T02D1917:51a-33: gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de
T02D1917:51a-34: bzhin gshegs pa de rnams gdug pa rnams gsod pa'i
T02D1917:51a-35: phyir khros pa mtshon cha sna tshogs phyag na bsnams
T02D1917:51a-36: par bsams la sbyor ba 'dis gdug pa'i las bya'o
T02D1917:51a-37: // sangs rgyas sku gsung mchog stsol ba //
T02D1917:51a-38: zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub stsol ba'o //
T02D1917:51a-39: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje ni rdo
T02D1917:51a-40: rje gsum gyi gnas te de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1917:51a-41: gang yin pa ste de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D1917:51a-42: // dngos grub ni gdug pa gsod pa'i dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1917:51b-0: sangs rgyas sku gsung mchog @51b stsol ba //
T02D1917:51b-1: zhes bya ba ni tha mal bar sbyar te gang
T02D1917:51b-2: bsad par mngon par 'dod pa de 'chi bar 'di
T02D1917:51b-3: ni gdon mi za zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02D1917:51b-4: bsad pa nyid ni rmongs pa'i bdag nyid tsam du 'dod do //
T02D1917:51b-5: nyi ma bdun du 'di byas na //
T02D1917:51b-6: zhes bya ba ni gdug pa'i las tsi tsam du bya ba'o //
T02D1917:51b-7: sangs rgyas kyang ni zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba
T02D1917:51b-8: 'di shin tu yang bzlog par dka' ba nyid du
T02D1917:51b-9: gsungs pa'o // grub mi 'gyur zhes bya ba gang
T02D1917:51b-10: 'di gdug pa rnams la drag pos 'dul bar mi
T02D1917:51b-11: byed na rnal 'byor pa dam tshig nyams pas 'grub
T02D1917:51b-13: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni //
T02D1917:51b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'khor lo las byung ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D1917:51b-15: rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bskyed la /
T02D1917:51b-16: nam mkha'i dbyings su rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil
T02D1917:51b-17: 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste g-yas pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1917:51b-18: nam mkha' dang mnyam par rnam par bsams la /
T02D1917:51b-19: 'khor lo de'i steng du rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan par bsam mo //
T02D1917:51b-20: dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba //
T02D1917:51b-21: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni 'das pa
T02D1917:51b-22: dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams
T02D1917:51b-23: te / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
T02D1917:51b-24: phra rab dang mnyam pa thams cad khro bo'i dkyil
T02D1917:51b-26: sems can gyi khams thams cad kyang 'od kyis snang
T02D1917:51b-27: bar byas nas khro bo'i rigs kyi ngo bor byas
T02D1917:51b-28: te // slar bsdus nas rang gi lus la gzhug
T02D1917:51b-29: la yang khro bo spro bar byas la nam mkha'i
T02D1917:51b-30: te // khams bkang ste / 'di skad du //
T02D1917:51b-31: sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson //
T02D1917:51b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do //
T02D1917:51b-33: de nas de ltar brjod nas dgra gsad par bya'o //
T02D1917:51b-34: gal te dam tshig las 'das na //
T02D1917:51b-35: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa gang nus bzhin
T02D1917:51b-36: du gdug pa rnams la chad pa'i las mi byed
T02D1917:51b-37: na'o // zhig par 'gyur pa ni 'chi ba ste /
T02D1917:51b-38: gang gi phyir khros pa ma yin yang sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir /
T02D1917:51b-39: khro bo chen po'i gzugs rab tu ston pa ni dam tshig go //
T02D1917:51b-40: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can //
T02D1917:51b-41: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus su bsam //
T02D1917:51b-42: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nam mkha'i khams rdo rje'i rnam par bsams zhing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1917:52a-1: rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje can bsgom pa ni //
T02D1917:52a-2: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can te 'phags pa gshin rje'i gshed do //
T02D1917:52a-3: 'dir sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'phags pa gshin rje'i gshed kyi dkyil 'khor yin no //
T02D1917:52a-5: gshin rje'i gshed kyi 'khor lo che //
T02D1917:52a-6: rang gi rdo rje yin par brtag / ces bya ba gsungs te 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1917:52a-7: rang gi rdo rje yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rang gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1917:52a-9: 'phags pa gshin rje'i gshed kyi sbyor ba byas la
T02D1917:52a-10: rdo rje nam mkhar bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1917:52a-11: rnam par bsams la gnas lngar gshin rje'i gshed kyi
T02D1917:52a-13: de nas 'di gdug pa thams cad gsod par 'dod
T02D1917:52a-14: par gyur na sems can de la sems can thams
T02D1917:52a-15: cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsod par rnam par bsams te /
T02D1917:52a-16: 'di ni sems can mang po dang de bzhin gshegs
T02D1917:52a-17: pa rnams gsod pa'o zhes de la gsad pa'i phyir
T02D1917:52a-18: khro bo chen por bskyed la rang gi lag na
T02D1917:52a-19: yod pa'i be con gyi 'od zer gyi snang bas
T02D1917:52a-20: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa dang de bzhin
T02D1917:52a-21: gshegs pa rnams gshin rje'i gshed lta bur bskyed la
T02D1917:52a-22: rang gi lus la bcug nas yang spro bar bya
T02D1917:52a-23: ste / nam mkha' khyab par byas la de dang lhan cig dgra gsad par bya'o //
T02D1917:52a-25: dus gsum sangs rgyas sems can rnams //
T02D1917:52a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1917:52a-27: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
T02D1917:52a-28: rang sngags don gyi yon tan nam //
T02D1917:52a-29: zhes bya ba ni lha'i khyad par thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs khros pas /
T02D1917:52a-30: rang gi dkyil 'khor la zhugs pas 'phags pa gshin
T02D1917:52a-31: rje'i gshed kyi skabs su bshad pa'i sbyor bas gdug
T02D1917:52a-32: pa rnams tshar gcad par bya'o //
T02D1917:52a-33: rang gi sngags kyi yon tan ni khro bo'i sngags
T02D1917:52a-34: gang gdug pa nyid de gdug pa'i las ston pa
T02D1917:52a-35: des bya'o // 'di sa ni lha thams cad kyi spyi'i las bstan pa yin no //
T02D1917:52a-36: yang na gtsug tor dam tshig gis //
T02D1917:52a-37: zhes bya ba ni gtsug tor chen po dang 'khor los sgyur ba dang brgyad de /
T02D1917:52a-38: yang na de dag gis bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1917:52b-0: @52b sngags kun bsrung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1917:52b-1: gang 'dir rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags pa de dag bsrung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1917:52b-2: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa bsrung ba'i phyir gang gis kyang mi phyed de /
T02D1917:52b-3: de dag ni mi phyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1917:52b-4: nam mkha' rdo rje dbus dag tu //
T02D1917:52b-5: zhes bya ba ni go cha'o //
T02D1917:52b-6: chos kyi snang mdzad sku mchog las //
T02D1917:52b-7: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad nyid go char bsgom pa'o //
T02D1917:52b-8: 'byung ba'i sku gsum dam tshig dag / ces bya ba ni sku gsungs thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1917:52b-9: bsams nas gdan du rab tu brtag / chos kyi
T02D1917:52b-10: tshul te da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdan
T02D1917:52b-11: du rab tu brtag par bya'o //
T02D1917:52b-12: rang sngags kyi ge gnas ye shes //
T02D1917:52b-13: thugs kyi rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D1917:52b-14: zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa bya ba'i sngags sangs
T02D1917:52b-15: rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bor rnam par bsams la
T02D1917:52b-16: / de zla ba rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1917:52b-17: sangs rgyas rnams ni sems tsam du //
T02D1917:52b-18: bsgoms nas slar yang bsdu bar bya //
T02D1917:52b-19: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas te zla ba rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1917:52b-20: thugs kyi rdo rje yin pa'i phyir //
T02D1917:52b-21: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi sems 'di ni thugs rdo rje'o zhes nges par bskyed la /
T02D1917:52b-22: sku gsum gyi cho ga de la gzung bar bya ba'o //
T02D1917:52b-24: rnam par snang mdzad kyis sbyor ba byas la rdo
T02D1917:52b-25: rje nam mkha' de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo
T02D1917:52b-26: rje'i cho ga de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1917:52b-27: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phra rab las
T02D1917:52b-28: bsgrubs par bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02D1917:52b-29: de nas rang gi sngags kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D1917:52b-30: thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sems
T02D1917:52b-31: can sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ngo bor rnam par bsams
T02D1917:52b-32: la / rdo rje zla ba'i rab tu sbyor bas
